articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Syrian Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Syrian Delegation
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday had a talk with a delegation of the Syrian General Sports Union led by Chairman Mowaffak Twfiek Jounaa which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Syrian Official
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Syrian Official
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the chairman of the Syrian General Sports Union on a visit to the DPRK.
					 Chairman Mowaffak Twfiek Jounaa, who is the visiting union delegation, on Monday handed the gift over to Kim Yong Nam, president of Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Syrian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Syrian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Syrian General Sports Union led by Chairman Mowaffak Twfiek Jounaa visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					The guests looked round historic relics preserved at the old home, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and his family members.
					
					They also toured various stadiums at a sports village in Chongchun Street, the Pyongyang Sports Goods Factory, etc.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Inspects Pyongyang Automation Appliances Factory
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Inspects Pyongyang Automation Appliances Factory
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju of the DPRK made field survey of the Pyongyang Automation Appliances Factory.
					 Going round various parts of the factory, he encouraged its officials and workers in the general drive to attain the five-year strategic target for national economic development ahead of schedule.
					
					 He stressed the need for the factory to bring about an innovative surge in the production of electrical appliances for daily use with its own efforts, indigenous technology and locally available resources in the spirit of creating the Mallima speed and steadily raise the quality of goods in order to produce more famous goods favored by the people.
					
					 Earlier, he learned about the remodeling of the Namyang Saltern, the Fisheries Institute under the State Academy of Sciences and the Institute of Pomiculture of the Institute of Agricultural Science and took measures to ensure the quality of construction at the highest level and supply materials needed for the construction in good time.

articles.title: GFTUK Delegation Returns Home
articles.content:
GFTUK Delegation Returns Home
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea led by Chairman Ju Yong Gil returned home Monday after taking part in the meeting of the Presidential Council of the World Federation of Trade Unions and visiting Cuba.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 1st anniversary of his election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral basket and letter were conveyed to Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Roman O. Jimenez Ortega, military attache of the Cuban embassy who is doyen of the corps, on Monday.

articles.title: Delegation of Youth League of Koreans in Japan Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Youth League of Koreans in Japan Leaves
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of officials of the Korean Youth League in Japan led by Vice-Chairman of Its Central Standing Committee Jo Myong Jin left here on Monday.

articles.title: Construction of Samjiyon County Progresses Apace in DPRK
articles.content:
Construction of Samjiyon County Progresses Apace in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Builders of the 216 Division are making achievements to spruce up Samjiyon County, a sacred land of the Korean revolution in Ryanggang Province, the DPRK.
					 The Construction Brigade 618 under the division dug out hundreds cubic meters of earth and tamped thousands cubic meters of concrete to lay a foundation for the Paektusan Museum.
					
					 A regiment of the brigade also removed thousands cubic meters of earth and installed various fixtures and laid electric wire as part of their efforts to construct an intermediary base for producing building-materials.
					
					 The Hyesan-Samjiyon Railway Construction Brigade is building up railroad bed, structures, a railway bridge and railway stations at the final stage.
					
					 Achievements have also been made by other regiments of the division in producing timber and building a wind-solar power station with the capacity of several hundred kW.
					
					 Meanwhile, the 914 headquarters has pushed ahead with a project to turn the county into a model one in potato farming.

articles.title: DPRK Army and People Resolve to Mercilessly Punish Terrorist Maniacs
articles.content:
DPRK Army and People Resolve to Mercilessly Punish Terrorist Maniacs
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The towering hatred and spirit of annihilating the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors prevail in the DPRK after a statement was released by its Ministry of State Security.
					 Ri Kwang Rim, an officer of the Korean People's Army (KPA), said he could hardly repress his indignation against the U.S., kingpin of international terrorism, and the south Korean puppet group of traitors for hatching a vicious plot to hurt the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 We are keeping within our sight the U.S., a source of evils and chieftain of terrorism, and the south Korean puppet group of traitors running amuck to get the sun eclipsed, he said, adding:
					
					 The KPA is fully determined to wipe out the throng of rats sneaking around only in the dark afraid of the invincible might of the KPA.
					
					 The enemies will clearly see how powerful a series of our-style anti-terrorism striking actions and righteous strike of the invincible revolutionary Paektusan army would be.
					
					 Pak Myong Chol, a worker of the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex, said:
					
					 It is high time to mete out a merciless punishment to the heinous enemies who seek for hurting our supreme leadership. We will ferret out to the last one the organizer, conspirator and followers of the recent hideous state-sponsored terrorism even by ransacking the whole earth, no matter at which corner of the planet they may be, and throw them into electric furnace.
					
					 Ri Kum Chol, head of the Cha Kwang Su Youth Shock Brigade in the Ongjin Mine, said:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet riff-raffs hatched a plot to hurt our supreme leadership by use of biochemical substance.
					
					 It is our determination to frustrate the heinous enemies' reptile and outrageous plots with increased production in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development.

articles.title: International Justice Is Guaranteed by Tremendous Strength: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
International Justice Is Guaranteed by Tremendous Strength: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- In his report reviewing the work of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea made to its 7th Congress, respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un said that progressive peoples around the world should wage a vigorous struggle for international justice. He stressed it can be achieved only when the anti-imperialist independent countries are sufficiently strong.
					 The situation that prevailed the international arena for the past one year once again proved the validity of the WPK's principled stand on international justice.
					
					 Due to the ferocious domination and intervention by the U.S.-led imperialist forces, the universally recognized basic principles governing the international relations were openly ignored, and justice was incriminated as thing unjust to meet the interests of big powers.
					
					 They tried to describe their own human rights abuses as something for "preventing" crimes, anti-criminal actions of anti-imperialist independent countries as "violation of human rights" and their missiles as the ones for "peace and justice" and missile development of others as "unjust actions harassing peace" in a bid to make the world the lawless planet.
					
					 Under the old international order governed by injustice, the U.S. and its vassal forces are going at large as if they hold all the decision-making power including intervening in the internal affairs of other countries by applying double standards and adopting "resolutions" devoid of legal grounds.
					
					 Some countries outwardly professing justice, impartiality and non-interference fail to speak out under the duress of the U.S. and even are prone to such a foolish act as pricking one's eyes with one's own hands without principle.
					
					 The serious incidents that were witnessed in different parts of the world including the Korean peninsula and the Mideast clearly prove which way leads to international justice.
					
					 When countries in the Mid-east were at a loss what to do after being hit by missiles and bombs under the present U.S. administration's aggression policy, the DPRK, a nuclear power in the East, made consecutive launches striking terror into the spines of provocateurs along with a powerful declaration of its will to defend international justice.
					
					Pyongyang declared it would face any option made by the U.S. and answer an all-out war in kind and a nuclear war with its own style nuclear strike.
					
					 By the DPRK's will to make merciless retaliation against the U.S. ferocious military adventurous moves and by its tremendous military capabilities, the story about war crisis, "April crisis", on the peninsula much touted by the U.S. and its followers ended up in fiasco.
					
					 As the reality shows, international justice cannot come of its own accord but can be realized only when anti-imperialist independent countries are sufficiently strong.
					
					 The DPRK, as it had already clarified, will bolster at a remarkably fast pace the capabilities for Korean-style preemptive nuclear strike as long as the U.S. continues its hostile policy toward the DPRK and vicious nuclear threat and blackmail.
					
					 The DPRK's measure for bolstering the capabilities of its nuclear force will be taken in a many-sided and consecutive way at any place and at any moment decided by its supreme leadership.
					
					 The world will clearly see how the DPRK with nuclear sword of justice will control the U.S. use of nuclear weapons of tyranny and lead it to its final ruin.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lashes Out at U.S. Moves to Ignite War against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lashes Out at U.S. Moves to Ignite War against DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- No sooner had the anti-DPRK nuclear war drills closed than the U.S. was busy with the moves to ignite a war against it.
					 Recently the USS Michigan, a nuclear-powered submarine, arrived at waters off south Korea under the pretext of annual visit where a nuclear-powered carrier strike group has been deployed.
					
					 This is the intent to openly threaten the DPRK, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 It is the invariable aggressive intent of the U.S. to hold its military hegemony on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia and dominate the world. The intent to invade the DPRK will never change though the ruling quarters of the U.S. are replaced. 
					
					 All forms of joint military drills staged by the U.S. imperialists together with south Korean puppet group and the Japanese reactionaries are the root cause of the worsening situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is the gangster-like logic that their ceaseless war drills do not pose threats, but the steps of the Korean People's Army for self-defence to cope with them should be called into question.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces' nuclear war drills can never be justified, although the guilty party files the suit first.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail and nuclear arms race are the main cause forcing the DPRK to have nuclear attack capability for self-defence and further bolster up it.
					
					 The only way of protecting peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the region to cope with the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail is to increase the nuclear force, both in quality and quantity, in order to mercilessly wipe out the aggressors and provokers.
					
					 The DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the fact that the new U.S. administration openly reveals its intent to militarily pressurize and invade the DPRK, vociferating about "peace by force of arms".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korean Puppet Conservatives Group of Traitors Seeking Confrontation and War
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korean Puppet Conservatives Group of Traitors Seeking Confrontation and War
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The present tragic north-south relations are attributable to the south Korean puppet group of conservatives who brought back the past era of confrontation and escalated the political and military confrontation between the fellow countrymen to the extremes while holding power for nearly 10 years, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 The puppet group of conservatives consist of senseless traitors seeking only confrontation and war, not wishing for national reconciliation and unity, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The "north policies" put forward by the Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye groups are policies for a war of aggression against the north.
					
					 The north-south relations that have steadily deteriorated for the nearly ten years are related to the steady racket for the DPRK-targeted war drills which the puppet group of traitors waged in collusion with the U.S.
					
					 It is the black-hearted intention of the puppet group of conservatives to realize their ambition for an aggression of the north even by reducing the 3 000-ri land of Korea into debris and throwing the nation into the sea of blood.
					
					 The puppet group whose fate is at stake, under the censure and rejection by the people, are playing a sleight of hand to cover up their crimes of bedeviling the north-south ties and shift the blame for the escalating tension on to the DPRK.
					
					 The north-south ties can never be saved from a catastrophe if the wild acts of the puppet group of conservatives are overlooked.
					
					 The south Koreans have lived in uneasiness and horror over increasing danger of a nuclear war due to the traitors who are backed by outside forces, utterly indifferent to the fate of the country and the nation. If the group of traitors is allowed to take power again, the tragic days will be extended.
					
					 There is nothing to be expected from the group of conservatives keen on escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the light of their past crimes and their present conduct.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms Key Resolve and Foal Eagle Acts Going beyond Declaration of War
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms Key Resolve and Foal Eagle Acts Going beyond Declaration of War
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills disclosed the dirty nature of the U.S. which can not live even a single day without giving off smell of gunpowder and blood, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary.
					 The war drills this year were unprecedentely provocative and dangerous confrontational hysteria in view of its scale, program and purpose, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 The nuclear force of the DPRK, a just treasured sword for safeguarding the sovereignty of the country and the right to existence of the nation from the threat and blackmail of the nuclear war, is branded as "threat" and the launches of strategic rocket, means for self-defence for deterring aggression and war, have to be censured as "provocation". Yet, the brigandish act carried out by the U.S. at the doorstep of the DPRK by resorting to nuclear war drills for depriving Koreans of their space for existence is said to "contribute" to peace and security. This is the U.S. gangster-like logic of high impudence.
					
					 However hard the U.S. may try to veil its Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills for aggression and justify their "validity", they can not cover up the sordid ambition to put the whole of Korea under its military rule and, furthermore, put Northeast Asia and the world under its control.
					
					 The U.S. worked out meticulous plans for committing state-sponsored terrorism, overturning social system and conducting destruction and sabotage, and staged war drills with the involvement of all strike means for carrying out the operation. This is little short of putting the plan into an actual war after going beyond the phase of making the declaration of a war.
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle showed that a nuclear war may break out on the Korean peninsula any moment.
					
					 War has not yet broken out on the peninsula, the world's biggest hotspot. This is entirely thanks to the tremendous capabilities for self-defence of the DPRK with the nuclear force as a pivot.
					
					 The DPRK is neither Syria in the Mideast nor Libya in Africa.
					
					 The indiscriminate nuclear strike to be mounted by the DPRK without any advance warning, unrestricted by anything, will make those keen on aggression and war to keenly feel the stamina of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces South Korean Acting "President's" Rubbish
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces South Korean Acting "President's" Rubbish 
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- At the recent last "state council meeting," Hwang Kyo An, puppet acting president of south Korea, urged his yes men to "buckle down to management of 'presidential' election." He hurled mud at the DPRK, talking about "lingering concern about its possible provocation."
					 Hwang's repetition of the story about "north's provocation" is no more than a paradox that can be let out only by a guy seized with inveterate hostility toward the compatriots in the north and the idea of confrontation with them, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Hwang's reckless behavior is no more than the last hysteric fit of a poor psychopath exasperated by the invincible spirit of the service personnel and people of the DPRK making a dynamic advance in the face of challenges by the hostile forces.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group is going so stupid as to still dream the wild dream for stifling the compatriots in the north though its miserable end is imminent.
					
					 Hwang had better pack up his things before going to a jail. 
					
					 The remnants of the Park Geun Hye-led conservative group forsaken by the public are bound to be sternly punished by history.
					
					 All Koreans will surely make the group of traitors pay dearly for their unpardonable crimes against reunification by meting out a severe punishment on them.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Blasts Hwang Kyo An for Covering Park Geun Hye's Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Blasts Hwang Kyo An for Covering Park Geun Hye's Crimes
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The newspaper Hangyore and other media of south Korea condemned puppet Prime Minister Hwang Kyo for covering the crimes of traitor Park Geun Hye.
					 According to media, Hwang made tens of thousands of documents of the "presidential" secretariat and guards the ones which can not be made public for 15 to 30 years.
					
					 Such an action made it difficult to make public the most vital clues about the Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal in the trial, said the media.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Kuwait
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Kuwait
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- A publishing house of Kuwait brought out in pamphlet respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People".
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il during their lifetime.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for firmly preserving and glorifying their ideas and exploits.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on April 12.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Highly Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Highly Praised by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Colorful political and cultural events were held in Bangladesh, Indonesia, Mongolia, Hungary, Romania, Austria, Slovenia, Angola, Ethiopia, Algeria and Mexico to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy and other speakers praised Kim Il Sung as the greatest man and a peerlessly great sage, saying he set forth a nation-building line suited to the actual conditions of the country and interests of the people and built a genuine country for the people where they became masters of everything and everything serves them.
					
					 The chairman and members of the Hungarian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun stressed that the exploits of Kim Il Sung would always be remembered.
					
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the New Socialist Party of Romania who doubles as chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Romania highly praised Kim Il Sung as an ardent patriot and steadfast internationalist who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and the nation and global independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de Choe Tong Ryun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de Choe Tong Ryun
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un envio el dia 5 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del investigador de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, Dr. Choe Tong Ryun, Cientifico del Pueblo, candidato al academico y profesor titular, expresando profundas condolencias por su defuncion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta del presidente sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta del presidente sirio
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de respuesta que le dirigiera el dia 4 el Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Profundamente agradecido por las amables felicitaciones que me ha enviado Vd. por mi reeleccion como Secretario Regional del Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe, formulo votos mas sinceros por la salud y felicidad de Vd. y el mayor progreso y desarrollo del amistoso pueblo de su pais.
					
					Apreciamos mucho el hecho de que el Partido del Trabajo de Corea apoya al Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe, en particular, Vd. y la Direccion de su pais amistoso prestan atencion a la superacion de las actuales dificultades por nuestro pais y respaldan nuestra posicion de solucionar de manera pacifica la crisis de ahora basandose en el dialogo nacional, especificamente, defendiendo la integridad territorial de Siria y los intereses del pueblo y recuperando la seguridad y paz de la region.
					
					Reciba el testimonio de mi mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: Detenido ciudadano norteamericano en la RPDC
articles.content:
Detenido ciudadano norteamericano en la RPDC 
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- En virtud de la ley correspondiente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, un organo competente de la RPDC detuvo el dia 6 al ciudadano norteamericano Jin Xue Song, sospechoso de cometer actos hostiles anti-RPDC. El trabajaba para la operacion de la Universidad de Ciencias y Tecnicas de Pyongyang.
					El organo competente esta realizando ahora una investigacion detallada sobre el delito del detenido.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con la delegacion siria
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con la delegacion siria
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 8 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion de la Union Deportiva General de la Republica Arabe de Siria, encabezada por su presidente Mowaffak Twfiek Jounaa, que le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju averigua gestiones de Fabrica de Aparatos de Automatizacion de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju averigua gestiones de Fabrica de Aparatos de Automatizacion de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju averiguo en el terreno las gestiones de la Fabrica de Aparatos de Automatizacion de Pyongyang.
					Dando vueltas por varios puntos de la fabrica, Pak estimulo a los funcionarios y obreros que libran una ofensiva general para conquistar con antelacion las metas de la estrategia quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional. 
					
					Insistio en la necesidad de levantar un auge en la produccion de los articulos electricos de uso diario con las fuerzas, tecnologias y recursos nacionales avivando las llamas de creacion de la velocidad de Mallima y producir mucho mas mercancias de buena calidad. 
					
					Con anterioridad, el hizo conocimiento del estado de reconstruccion de la Salina de Namyang, el Instituto Central de Piscicultura de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias y el Centro de Estudio de Fruticultura del Instituto de Ciencias Agricolas buscando las medidas para asegurar en el maximo nivel la calidad de la construccion y suministrar a tiempo los materiales necesarios a las obras.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de agregados militares en Corea
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de agregados militares en Corea
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores y carta de felicitacion que le dirigiera el Cuerpo de Agregados Militares acreditados en Corea con motivo del primer aniversario de su eleccion como Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					El agregado militar cubano Roman O. Jimenez Ortega, quien preside el Cuerpo, los entrego el dia 8 al general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Pak Yong Sik, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.
